verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: south sudan] [ARG0: armed opposition] [V: seized] [ARG1: girls] [ARGM-PRD: as wives] south sudan armed opposition abducted women and girls as young as 12 and lined them up so commanders could choose wives and those not selected were left to be raped repeatedly by other fighters a new u n report said thursday the report based on victim and witness accounts gives new details on the surge in violence and abuses that occurred even as south sudan rivals negotiated the latest agreement to end a five - year civil war the associated press nyagoah pur sudan africa sam mednick salva kiir mayardit riek machar michelle bachelet johannesburg un south sudan president salva kiir u n rape
